content:
| Item | Details |
| --- | --- |
| LostCard | User is inquiring about a lost or stolen company credit card. Not to be used for damaged cards. |
| AdoptionReimbursement | User has an inquiry or concern regarding the Adoption Reimbursement program. |
| UpdateCardDetails | User wants to update their contact information such as email, phone number and mailing address for their corporate credit card profile. Name on card cannot be updated with this item. |
| TuitionReimbursement | User has an inquiry or concern regarding the Tuition Reimbursement program. This is not for use with credit card charges. |
| ApplyCreditCard | User wants to apply for or renew a corporate credit card. |

September 21, 2023

To: Support
From: user8302

Re: broken card while traveling on business

Hi,

I have a real issue regarding my credit card and need it resolved today.  While I was on a trip my card got caught in a gas pump and tore.  I was able to still use it while traveling to charge my expenses but now the whole corner is missing and part of the magnetic strip is impacted. 

What do I do now? How can I get this fixed?

I just can't not have a card.  I still have so much left of my trip.  I have to meet with clients and give several presentations that require me to be in different places, staying overnight, traveling many miles between destinations.  I also need to be able to eat.  I am at my whit's end here.

Help!
Martha
B2B Business Consultant - Remote
Omaha Office
(she, her)


Which of the items would you match Martha's situation to? In a json, return those items that match.  If none of the items apply to Martha's situation, create a json with item = Not Applicable.  If more that one item is applicable, arrange the items alphabetically in the json.  Do not provide any other reasoning or text outside of the json.
